description:
Dot likes to talk and can say many things.  
Let's help Dot say the names of colored lights!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically say "Red" then automatically turn on red lights.

hints.description: Drag out a Red light and a curious sound. Set the sound to "Red". Link the states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: After turning on red lights, make Dot automatically say "Yellow" then automatically turn on yellow lights.

hints.description: Drag out a Yellow light and a curious sound. Set the sound to "Yellow". Link the states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: After turning on yellow lights, make Dot automatically say "Green" then automatically turn on green lights.

hints.description: Drag out a Green light and a curious sound. Set the sound to "Green". Link the states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: Make Dot turn on each light before saying the matching color.
puzzles.introduction: Auto cues wait for the sounds to finish before turning on the lights. Let's see what happens when we turn on the lights first!

hints.description: Drag all of the links to the trash.
Add new links with Auto cues to turn on each light before playing the matching sound. Do Red then Yellow then Green.
